alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Iberia, east central Lafayette and northwestern St. Martin Parishes through 1130 AM CDT... At 1100 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Loreauville, or near New Iberia, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Iberia, Catahoula, St. Martinville, Broussard, Loreauville, Cade, Butte La Rose, Coteau, Lydia, Lake Fausse Pointe, Acadiana Regional Airport and Parks. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 124 and 126. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin
